note.p: Army officer. Son of the Rev. Edward Mostyn Owen of Cound, Shropshire. Married Mary Susan Parker, CD’s niece, in 1866.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2767/32/8), 1881 (RG11/2666/73/20)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 May 2015)
